video_prompt: A rider in a billowing red robe on a white horse stands firm on a rocky cliff as crashing waves churn below. Dark clouds drift ominously, partially obscuring a glowing full moon as it shifts across the sky.
image_prompt: A graphic illustration of a person in a billowing red robe on a white horse, seen from behind, at the edge of a rocky cliff overlooking a turbulent dark blue sea with crashing white-capped waves. Above, a large full moon is partially obscured by ominous, dark, stalactite-like clouds in a gray sky. The style is bold, with defined lines and solid colors, resembling an ink or marker drawing. Overall dramatic and foreboding.
refined_video_prompt: The red robe billows. Waves crash and churn below. Dark clouds drift ominously, intermittently obscuring and revealing the glowing full moon as it shifts across the sky.
